"use client" import { memo } from "react" import Image from "next/image" import { cn } from "@/lib/utils/utils" import { useSectionVisibility } from "@/hooks/use-section-visibility" interface BenefitProps { title: string description: string image: string imagePosition?: "left" | "right" } const BenefitCard = memo(function BenefitCard({ title, description, image, imagePosition = "right" }: BenefitProps) { return (

{title}

{description}

) }) export const Benefits = memo(function Benefits() { useSectionVisibility() return (

Beneficios

Descubre las ventajas de formar parte de nuestra comunidad galáctica

{benefits.map((benefit) => ( ))}
) })
